N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2250.3 - Designation of fiscal officer

State Regulations
(a) The Treasurer, 405 Lexington Avenue, New York, NY 10017 is designated the
fiscal officer, who shall certify the payroll and respond to requests, in
accordance with section
2250.6
(b) of this

Part, for an itemized record setting forth the name, address, title and salary
of every officer or employee of the agency. (b) The fiscal officer shall make the payroll
items listed previously, available to any person including bona fide members of
the news media as required under section 88(1)(g), (1)(i) and (10) of the

Freedom of Information Law. Notes
